short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plug in your keyboard and play along your favourite YouTube creator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an accompanying extension to youkey.pillars.ch. It keeps YouKey synchronized to the playing video so that you can easily figure out what key a song is in. It also allows you to simply click the extension to open the video in a new YouKey tab.
